Name: Lucky House
Review Text: Fabulous place where to pit stop and enjoy delicious food with really friendly mood.

Name: Lucky House
Review Text: Heel lekker. Top place‚Äî kind and talent people, peaceful ambiance, tasty fresh food. I recommend their steamed vegetable dumplings. I'll be back soon.

Name: Lucky House
Review Text: Great restaurant for dining or take-out. Chinese-Indonesian cuisine, which is quite common in the Netherlands, but will be unlike any Chinese restaurants that tourists are familiar with. Brought over by Chinese that had been living in ‚Ä¶

Name: Lucky House
Review Text: Tucked away in the outskirts of the  Jordaan,  one could quite easily walk past this restaurant with its unpretentious exterior and be totally unaware as to its existence; That would be a pity because Lucky House is a true gem. Step inside ‚Ä¶

Name: Lucky House
Review Text: Super tasty food, staff is kind and quick, very reasonable prices and many vegetarian options (though I had the sweet and sour deep fried pork which was delicious). Also best jasmin tea I've ever had, not bitter at all :) - highly recommended restaurant!!

Name: Lucky House
Review Text: This is the only place we go for chinese food. We don't even live in Amsterdam! The owners and hosts are extremely friendly and attentive. They remember who their clients are and what their food preferences are. They quality of their food ‚Ä¶

Name: Lucky House
Review Text: Great take out food. Friendly, very quick and delicious! The peking duck was tender but crispy on the outside.

Name: Lucky House
Review Text: One of the greatest chinese restaurant in Amsterdam! On top of offering a great selection of  always delicious, generously served, varied healthy and fresh plates; the adorable couple of owners are always friendly, caring and very ‚Ä¶

Name: Lucky House
Review Text: Small, clean, and casual restaurant with amazing food. This is some of the best Chinese food I have had and I would highly recommend both the ossenhaas with pepper sauce or the mapo tofu.  Prices are reasonable for the portion size. The restaurant is family owned and they treat their guest very well.

Name: Lucky House

Name: Lucky House
Review Text: Perfect Food , very reasonable prices , very friendly owner and perfect elegent interior design . Their chicken is Halal as per the owners input.  Two main course + 2 soda drinks like 25 Euros .

Review Text: The best Chinese restaurant in Amsterdam with super friendly staff and delicious homemade food. Unbeatable!
